text_block_list.text: Finally, the day of the Satsuki Sho, the first leg of the Classic Triple Crown. The racecourse is packed with many people—

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text: I wonder if Mihono Bourbon will pull it off! I came today to cheer her on.

text_block_list.name: Spectator B
text_block_list.text: Personally, I'm rooting for Matikanetannhauser.

text_block_list.name: Spectator B
text_block_list.text: Somehow, I feel like she might do something special. I can't quite put it into words.
Their hearts were racing with anticipation for the fierce battle about to begin.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: There were so many spectators~! It was like a festival!
choice_data_list: Don't be nervous, do your best
Don't be nervous, do your best

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Yes, of course!
There's no sign of her being overly excited. Feeling relieved that she seems fine, then—

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huh!!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Whoa, whoa, whoa! Let's go over there, Trainer!
For some reason, I was made to hide in the shadows.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: The underground path is where Umamusume psych themselves up before a race!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I sensed an intense fighting spirit, so I thought we shouldn't get in the way... see.
Where Matikanetannhauser pointed—Mihono Bourbon was standing.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Inhale... exhale... No abnormalities in mind or body.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Achieving the Triple Crown is my father's and my true goal—the mission condition is victory only.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Mission, commencing...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: As expected of the Umamusume said to be the protagonist of this race...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: —Wait, someone else is coming! Is that... Rice-san?
Rice Shower—an Umamusume with a small build and reserved personality.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Today, I'm following Bourbon-san.
Following, following...!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: By following... Rice can change too.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I'll become an Umamusume who makes everyone smile...
like Bourbon-san...!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
...Do your best, Rice.
Do your best... oh!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Ho ho ho...!
I see, Rice-san is following Bourbon-san...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
This looks like it'll be another
interesting race to watch!

I couldn't help but retort at the comment
that sounded like it was from the wings of the stage.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
No! That's! Of course!
I won't lose either!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
You're expecting it from me, after all,
I'm aiming to be a Triple Crown Umamusume!
choice_data_list: If that's how you feel, that's good

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Isn't that obvious by now!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Well, well, I should get going soon too!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I'll win the 'Satsuki Sho'! Yeah!

With a small mystery left hanging,
the 'Satsuki Sho' had begun.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ah, it was the opposite!
